name: Delta Decentralized
description: Delta Decentralized is a Layer 3 blockchain protocol that optimizes interoperability, scalability, and efficiency, integrating the robust security of Bitcoin, the versatility of Ethereumâ€™s smart contracts, and the high performance of Solana. As a Layer 3 solution, Delta builds upon Layer 1 and Layer 2 infrastructures to deliver an advanced ecosystem combining ultra-fast transactions, cross-chain interoperability, and optimized decentralized applications. Additionally, it incorporates a native decentralized exchange (DEX), inspired by industry leaders such as Binance, Kraken, Bybit, and Bitget. This comprehensive ecosystem is designed to drive mass adoption of decentralized finance (DeFi) through innovation, transparency, and a meticulously structured economic model.
